DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: raw_data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description:
This is the raw data associated with the the paper accepted in Proceedings of Royal Society: Biological Sciences, entitled; "Food vibrations: Asian spice sets lips trembling". It is a human psychophysical data about tactile frequency perception.
Please see the README.txt for the detail of the data structure, as well as the summary of the data acquisition.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Szechuan pepper
tactile perception
vibrotactile frequency
frequency adaptation
food
Human psychophysics
